txt.en: Iago Rhudd has asked you to remove metal pins from the siege engines of Sharmokal.\n\nSharmokal is located in southern Swanfleet.
You should bring the metal pins to Iago.\n\nIago Rhudd is in Lintrev.
'Have you done it? Hahah! I almost wish I could be there to see it when they try to hurl their next rock and the entire contraption falls to pieces!'
'Those pins are the secret to keeping the entire construction together. Bring them back to me after you have collected as many as you can.'
The siege engines of Sharmokal are deadly weapons with a secret design flaw.

'Hullo, there. Iago Rhudd's me name. Did you know that to the east we have some very unsavoury neighbours? Behind their walls terrible Orc-looking creatures have built deadly weapons, capable of throwing stones for miles! Well, maybe not miles, but very far, and with good accuracy. I have seen them practicing their aim on travellers on the road below.\n\n'Now, I happened to get a look at one of these machines up close once - do not ask how, it is a long tale. In any case, there is a flaw in their construction and they are too much the fool to realize it. A single pin, when removed, can render the entire contraption useless! I will pay you if you sneak into their town and steal away these pins. Bring them back to me, that I might forge arrow heads with them, to be used to defend Lintrev!'
